dmca.title: DMCA complaint again www.namibiatourism.com
dmca.body:
Greenlife
Southern Africa
Nature and Culture Based Travel Specialists Since 1992
[private] Cape Town, South Africa.
Tel: [private]	Fax: [private]
E-mail: [private]@greenlife.co.za


14 February 2005
Google, Inc, 
[private]
Attn: [private]

Dear Google

DCMA complaint again www.namibiatourism.com
I wish to lodge a complaint against the above website for copying verbatim from my site, www.honeymoon-safari.net, a total of 965 words, 36 images, comments from our past clients as well as design and layout of 3 pages, which is identical to 3 pages on my site.

As a result of this, it appears that google has penalized www.honevmoon-safari.net as the site has disappeared from your SERPS, after holding top positions for over 2 years. I would appreciate if you could please remove any penalty from this site asap, as I have never plagiarised or lifted any work or content from others...ever!

Details of the infringements as follows,
1. Affected URL's on www.honeymoon-safari.net are:

(i) www.honeymoon-safari.net/index.html

(ii) www.honeymoon-safari.net/love.html

(iii) www.honeymoon-safari.net/honeymon _tips.html

2. The copyrighted work at issue is the text, design, layout and images appearing 
at the following 3 URL's on www.namibiatourism.com

(i). www.namibiatourism.com/where_to_stay/honeymoon_namibia.asp 
197 words matching text, including 2 client comments of our past travelers, 5 images, design & table layout,

(ii) www.namibiatourism.com/where_to_stay/african _love_food.asp
383 words matching text, 13 images (including one of a director of our company), and complete design and layout.

iii) www.namibiatourism.com/where_to_stay/honevmoon_tips.asp 
385 words matching text, 18 images, design and layout

3. For Web Search on Google, www.honeymoon-safari.net has ranked between positions 1 and 3 for the keywords "honeymoon safari",
